subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Mike Cammalleri’s goal in the third period Friday night turned out to be the winner for the visiting Canadiens, who withstood a furious comeback to beat the Washington Capitals, 3-2.
snippet: Mike Cammalleri’s goal in the third period Friday night turned out to be the winner for the visiting Canadiens, who withstood a furious comeback to beat the Washington Capitals, 3-2.
